input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Fette Filter - Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter Compatible for Kenmore. (2-Pack)

Item specifications:
Easy to intsall. Replace every 6 months
15 times more effective than baking soda in reducing orders
Less costly than the OEM without compromising quality.
Compatible with Kenmore Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter
High Quality Fette Filter Brand Product
Carbon-based, long-lasting charcoal filter
Replace every 6 months
Packaging may vary


Product description:
input_text.Response A: Fette Filter Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter is compatible with Kenmore. It is a high-quality product that is less costly than OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) and is 15 times more effective than baking soda in reducing orders. The long-lasting carbon-based charcoal filter helps to reduce odors. It is easy to install and should be replaced every 6 months. The packaging may vary.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
